properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 5 at 2:51AM MST until February 6 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, temperatures in the middle
20s. For the Freeze Warning, temperatures in the upper 20s
expected.

* WHERE...Northwest Pinal County.

* WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM MST this
morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9
AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY
